name: Burgerfiend (Rouru_Studios, ArthuroX65, pinkalgamation)
description:
Burgerfiend is a simple yet challenging 3D platformer.

The player takes control of an evil burger named Hammy who hates healthy food and wreaks havoc in a vegan restaurant after being accidentally dropped by his delivery driver. 

His mission now is to land on a plate for a costumer to ruin his dinner.

On his way to this plate he must avoid all the dangers and of course all the healthy things in the kitchen.

Collect all fatty things on your way to ruin the dinner perfectly !

Made within 4 days as part of the HTK Game Jam

CONTROLS

CREDITS

- Music & Sounds from EpidemicSounds & WeLoveIndies

- Made with Unreal Engine

- Our team :
